Sportiva

Sportiva is online search engine for local sports activities, with results displayed eather on the map or in list layout. Advanced searching options include type of sport, age and search area.

Type of work:

UX Design Frontend Development

I covered UX design and front-end development of the application homepage.

Project Highlights:

The application homepage needed to combine search field + advanced filter, the results of search - a map or a list of nearby sports activities - and related news and promotions.
It was expected that many of the users will search nearby sports activities on their mobile devices, so special attention was given to formating the filter form (ending up with multiple nested checkboxes and a range-slider) to be usable on all screen sizes.

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
